articles.author: Jessica DiNapoli, Helen Reid, Arriana McLymore
articles.title: Shein, Temu branch further into toy market amid worry over fake products - Reuters
articles.description: Fast-growing specialty e-commerce sites such as PDD's Temu and its rival Shein are branching deeper into the business of selling toys.
